name: Shitstorm (edichief)
description:
This Game is made for the GMTK Gamejam 2021. Graphics and music were made within the 48 hours

Your best friend xXsuwupergamer1999Xx is finally ready to start his streamer career in earnest. And he has asked YOU to help him manage the community! (payment in shoutouts) As the chat moderator, it is your responsibility to make sure the community stays healthy and unproblematic. Foster relationships between users, encourage engagement and watch the support for your friend grow. But don’t forget to take care of all the haters on the loose! One angry comment could be enough to send the community into ruin, and we don’t want to know what xXsuwupergamer1999Xx would do if his plans to get famous fail…
